languages.text: {n}Офицер медленно ощупывает свое лицо и вздрагивает всем телом, касаясь носа.{/n} "Наверное, дьяволы... все же проворные твари, один давеча прыгнул мне на шею и впился когтями в лицо. Да, так, наверное, все и было..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Офицер медленно ощупывает свое лицо и вздрагивает всем телом, касаясь носа.{/n} "Наверное, дьяволы... все же проворные твари, один давеча прыгнул мне на шею и впился когтями в лицо. Да, так, наверное, все и было..."

languages.text: {n}The officer slowly runs his hands over his face, shuddering as he touches his nose.{/n} "Must have been the devils... They're fast — one of them jumped on my neck and sank its claws into my face just now. Yes, that must have been what happened..."
languages.original_text: {n}Офицер медленно ощупывает свое лицо и вздрагивает всем телом, касаясь носа.{/n} "Наверное, дьяволы... все же проворные твари, один давеча прыгнул мне на шею и впился когтями в лицо. Да, так, наверное, все и было..."

{n}The officer slowly runs his hands over his face, shuddering as he touches his nose.{/n} "Must have been the devils... They're fast — one of them jumped on my neck and sank its claws into my face just now. Yes, that must have been what happened..."

{n}The officer slowly runs his hands over his face, shuddering as he touches his nose.{/n} "Must have been the devils... They're fast — one of them jumped on my neck and sank its claws into my face just now. Yes, that must have been what happened..."

languages.text: {n}士官はゆっくりと手で顔をなぞり、鼻に触れると震えた。{/n}「悪魔の仕業でしょう…奴らはとても素早い…1匹は私の首めがけて飛んで、私の顔に爪を立てた。そう、確かそんなことがありました…」
languages.original_text: {n}The officer slowly runs his hands over his face, shuddering as he touches his nose.{/n} "Must have been the devils... They're fast — one of them jumped on my neck and sank its claws into my face just now. Yes, that must have been what happened..."

traits.locale_text: {n}士官はゆっくりと手で顔をなぞり、鼻に触れると震えた。{/n}「悪魔の仕業でしょう…奴らはとても素早い――1匹は私の首めがけて飛んで、私の顔に爪を立てた。そう、確かそんなことがありました…」

languages.text: {n}军官用手慢慢摸着自己的脸。当他摸到鼻子的时候，他浑身战栗了一下。{/n}“这肯定是魔鬼干的……它们跑得很快，刚刚有一只跳到了我的脖子上，把爪子怼在了我的脸上。没错，肯定就是这样……”
languages.original_text: {n}The officer slowly runs his hands over his face, shuddering as he touches his nose.{/n} "Must have been the devils... They're fast — one of them jumped on my neck and sank its claws into my face just now. Yes, that must have been what happened..."

traits.locale_text: {n}军官用手慢慢摸着自己的脸。当他摸到鼻子的时候，他浑身战栗了一下。{/n}“这肯定是魔鬼干的……它们跑得很快，刚刚有一只跳到了我的脖子上，把爪子怼在了我的脸上。没错，肯定就是这样……”

languages.text: {n}El oficial se frota lentamente la cara, estremeciéndose al tocar la nariz.{/n} «Deben de haber sido los diablos... Son rápidos... Uno de ellos se habrá abalanzado sobre mi cuello y me habrá arañado la cara. Sí, seguro que eso es lo que ha pasado...».
languages.original_text: {n}The officer slowly runs his hands over his face, shuddering as he touches his nose.{/n} "Must have been the devils... They're fast — one of them jumped on my neck and sank its claws into my face just now. Yes, that must have been what happened..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El oficial se frota lentamente la cara, estremeciéndose al tocar la nariz.{/n} «Deben de haber sido los diablos... Son rápidos... Uno de ellos se habrá abalanzado sobre mi cuello y me habrá arañado la cara. Sí, seguro que eso es lo que ha pasado...».

languages.text: {n}L'officier passe lentement ses mains sur son visage, et son corps est parcouru d'un frisson lorsqu'il touche son nez.{/n} « C'est certainement ces démons... Ils sont rapides ! L'un d'entre eux vient tout juste de me sauter au cou pour me griffer le visage. Oui, c'est forcément ce qu'il s'est passé... »
languages.original_text: {n}The officer slowly runs his hands over his face, shuddering as he touches his nose.{/n} "Must have been the devils... They're fast — one of them jumped on my neck and sank its claws into my face just now. Yes, that must have been what happened..."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'officier passe lentement ses mains sur son visage, et son corps est parcouru d'un frisson lorsqu'il touche son nez.{/n} « C'est certainement ces démons... Ils sont rapides ! L'un d'entre eux vient tout juste de me sauter au cou pour me griffer le visage. Oui, c'est forcément ce qu'il s'est passé... »

languages.text: {n}Der Offizier streicht langsam mit der Hand über sein Gesicht und erzittert, als er seine Nase berührt.{/n} "Das müssen die Teufel gewesen sein ... Sie sind schnell – einer ist gerade auf meinen Hals gesprungen und hat seine Zähne in mein Gesicht geschlagen. Ja, so muss es passiert sein ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The officer slowly runs his hands over his face, shuddering as he touches his nose.{/n} "Must have been the devils... They're fast — one of them jumped on my neck and sank its claws into my face just now. Yes, that must have been what happened..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Offizier streicht langsam mit der Hand über sein Gesicht und erzittert, als er seine Nase berührt.{/n} "Das müssen die Teufel gewesen sein ... Sie sind schnell – einer ist gerade auf meinen Hals gesprungen und hat seine Zähne in mein Gesicht geschlagen. Ja, so muss es passiert sein ..."

languages.text: {n}Subay; elini yavaşça yüzünde gezdiriyor, burnuna dokunduğunda irkiliyor.{/n} "Şeytanlar yüzünden olmalı. Çok hızlılar. Bir tanesi az önce boynuma sıçradı ve pençelerini yüzüme geçirdi. Evet, aynen böyle oldu."
languages.original_text: {n}The officer slowly runs his hands over his face, shuddering as he touches his nose.{/n} "Must have been the devils... They're fast — one of them jumped on my neck and sank its claws into my face just now. Yes, that must have been what happened..."
